alert.note: Alert for Silver Bow (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Montana, including the following county, Silver Bow, including the city of Butte. * WHEN...Until 815 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 622 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported water running down the roadway of Montana Street and Front Street in the city of Butte due to heavy rain from thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.30 and 0.50 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding along Montana Street and Front Street in the city of Butte. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
